title: Hamster from Hamsterdam
creator_credit: W. Reiner, Z Drakulic and ACI Films
brief_description: An animated film using three-dimensional objects for the characters. A song tells the story of the hamster searching for a pair of gloves to keep his hands warm. Designed to encourage story telling and rhyme making by children.
creator_credit_for_label: W. Reiner, Z Drakulic and ACI Films
